## Installing Packages and Importing Data

Before we start to explore the dataset, packages should be installed and the dataset should be imported.

### Installing Packages

tidyverse is required to visualize the data. Besides, webr is also used in this task to create ternary plot.

```{r}
packages = c('tidyverse','webr')
for(p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}
```
### Installing Packages

participants <- read_csv("data/Participants.csv")
